file_results.false_positive_reason: The flagged line (rc = os.system(cmd)) is used within a custom setuptools Command class (Doc) to invoke a documentation generation tool (pdoc) as part of the build process. This is a common and legitimate use of os.system in Python packaging scripts to automate documentation builds. The command executed is static and not influenced by untrusted user input, so there is no risk of arbitrary code execution or command injection. The rest of the code is standard for a setup.py file, and there are no indicators of malicious intent or behavior.
